name: Aftershock (itch)
description:
a game made by Hugo'Coda'Kieffer & Léonard'Koztar'Lambreck for The End of The World game jam.

you're a robot create to destroy the world and crush everything on your path. your goal is to go as far as possible, avoiding to make your legs overheat.try to get the best score on the online leaderboard 

  •  'A' and 'D' to move the left leg
  • 'LEFT ARROW' and  'RIGHT ARROW' to move the right leg
  • 'R' to restart
